div.script: (function() {var iFrame = document.createElement('iframe'); iFrame.style.display = 'none'; iFrame.style.border = "none"; iFrame.width = 310; iFrame.height = 256; iFrame.setAttribute && iFrame.setAttribute('scrolling', 'no'); iFrame.setAttribute('frameborder', '0'); setTimeout(function() {var contents = (iFrame.contentWindow) ? iFrame.contentWindow : (iFrame.contentDocument.document) ? iFrame.contentDocument.document : iFrame.contentDocument; contents.document.open(); contents.document.write(decodeURIComponent("%3Cdiv%20id%3D%22amznCharityBannerInner%22%3E%3Ca%20href%3D%22https%3A%2F%2Fsmile.amazon.com%2Fch%2F75-6001763%22%20target%3D%22_blank%22%3E%3Cdiv%20class%3D%22text%22%20height%3D%22%22%3E%3Cdiv%20class%3D%22support-wrapper%22%3E%3Cdiv%20class%3D%22support%22%20style%3D%22font-size%3A%2025px%3B%20line-height%3A%2028px%3B%20margin-top%3A%2029px%3B%20margin-bottom%3A%2029px%3B%22%3ESupport%20%3Cspan%20id%3D%22charity-name%22%20style%3D%22display%3A%20inline-block%3B%22%3EHedley%20ISD.%3C%2Fspan%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3Cp%20class%3D%22when-shop%22%3EWhen%20you%20shop%20at%20%3Cb%3Esmile.amazon.com%2C%3C%2Fb%3E%3C%2Fp%3E%3Cp%20class%3D%22donates%22%3EAmazon%20donates.%3C%2Fp%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3C%2Fa%3E%3C%2Fdiv%3E%3Cstyle%3E%23amznCharityBannerInner%7Bbackground-image%3Aurl(https%3A%2F%2Fm.media-amazon.com%2Fimages%2FG%2F01%2Fx-locale%2Fpaladin%2Fcharitycentral%2Fbanner-background-image._CB309675353_.png)%3Bwidth%3A300px%3Bheight%3A250px%3Bposition%3Arelative%7D%23amznCharityBannerInner%20a%7Bdisplay%3Ablock%3Bwidth%3A100%25%3Bheight%3A100%25%3Bposition%3Arelative%3Bcolor%3A%23000%3Btext-decoration%3Anone%7D.text%7Bposition%3Aabsolute%3Btop%3A20px%3Bleft%3A15px%3Bright%3A15px%3Bbottom%3A100px%7D.support-wrapper%7Boverflow%3Ahidden%3Bmax-height%3A86px%7D.support%7Bfont-family%3AArial%2Csans%3Bfont-weight%3A700%3Bline-height%3A28px%3Bfont-size%3A25px%3Bcolor%3A%23333%3Btext-align%3Acenter%3Bmargin%3A0%3Bpadding%3A0%3Bbackground%3A0%200%7D.when-shop%7Bfont-family%3AArial%2Csans%3Bfont-size%3A15px%3Bfont-weight%3A400%3Bline-height%3A25px%3Bcolor%3A%23333%3Btext-align%3Acenter%3Bmargin%3A0%3Bpadding%3A0%3Bbackground%3A0%200%7D.donates%7Bfont-family%3AArial%2Csans%3Bfont-size%3A15px%3Bfont-weight%3A400%3Bline-height%3A21px%3Bcolor%3A%23333%3Btext-align%3Acenter%3Bmargin%3A0%3Bpadding%3A0%3Bbackground%3A0%200%7D%3C%2Fstyle%3E")); contents.document.close(); iFrame.style.display = 'block';}); document.getElementById('amznCharityBanner').appendChild(iFrame); })();

span.br:
Please choose a Hedley Owl bank card when you have the option this spring. Every swipe makes a donation to our school!!!!
Donley County Bank Information

div.div: We recognize that this is not a perfect situation but we at Hedley ISD are ready to meet the current challenges head on and deliver meaningful instruction to our students. Teachers will be available for help everyday by different platforms. DISTANCE ...Read more...

div.span: **ALL ELEMENTARY STUDENTS NEED A PAIR OF GYM SHOES

div.div: At times Hedley ISD would like to publish student information in newspapers or other forms of public media. This information could include student name, pictures, academic performance, extra-curricular competitions, classroom activities or any other event your student is a part of. Please sign the attached document to give Hedley ISD permission to use your child’s information for media publication, and return to school as soon as possible.

There are many discounts available for students. Please take advantage of these savings.
Discounts For Students

p.span: We are in the process of “overhauling” all of our documents, images, forms, etc. to become ADA compliant. If you need a particular file that has not been converted yet, please email garrett.bains@hedleyisd.net or eric.alston@hedleyisd.net

div.div:
Hedley ISD | Postal address: P.O. Box 69 Hedley, TX 79237 | Physical Address: 301 Jones Hedley, TX 79237
Phone (806) 856-5323 | Fax (806) 856-5372 | ACCESSIBILITY
